guides.title: Hide Activity Status
guides.description: Control who can see when you were last active on Instagram.

steps.title: Open Instagram Settings
steps.instruction: Tap your profile icon, then the menu icon (three lines) in the top-right corner.

steps.title: Navigate to Privacy
steps.instruction: Tap 'Settings and privacy', then select 'Messages and story replies'.

steps.title: Disable Activity Status
steps.instruction: Toggle off 'Show activity status' to hide when you're active.

guides.title: Manage Story Privacy
guides.description: Control who can see your Instagram stories.

steps.title: Go to Privacy Settings
steps.instruction: Open Settings > Privacy.

steps.title: Select Story
steps.instruction: Tap on 'Story' under 'Interactions'.

steps.title: Hide Story From
steps.instruction: Select people you want to hide your story from, or create a Close Friends list.

guides.title: Control Comments on Posts
guides.description: Manage who can comment on your Instagram posts.

steps.title: Access Privacy Settings
steps.instruction: Navigate to Settings > Privacy.

steps.title: Select Comments
steps.instruction: Tap on 'Comments' under 'Interactions'.

steps.title: Block Comments From
steps.instruction: Choose to block comments from everyone, people you don't follow, or specific people.

steps.title: Enable Manual Filter
steps.instruction: Turn on manual filter to review comments before they appear on your posts.

guides.title: Restrict or Block Accounts
guides.description: Restrict or block accounts without them knowing.

steps.title: Visit the Account
steps.instruction: Go to the profile of the account you want to restrict or block.

steps.title: Open Options Menu
steps.instruction: Tap the three dots in the top-right corner.

steps.title: Choose Action
steps.instruction: Select 'Restrict' to limit interaction without blocking, or 'Block' to completely block the account.

guides.title: Manage Tagged Photos
guides.description: Control who can tag you in photos and approve tags before they appear.

steps.title: Open Tag Settings
steps.instruction: Go to Settings > Privacy > Tags.

steps.title: Enable Tag Approval
steps.instruction: Toggle on 'Manually approve tags' so you can review tags before they appear on your profile.

steps.title: Remove Existing Tags
steps.instruction: Go to your profile, tap the tagged icon, and remove any unwanted tags.

guides.title: Hide Like and View Counts
guides.description: Hide like and view counts on your posts and others' posts.

steps.title: Access Privacy Settings
steps.instruction: Navigate to Settings > Privacy.

steps.title: Select Posts
steps.instruction: Tap on 'Posts' under 'Interactions'.

steps.title: Hide Like Counts
steps.instruction: Toggle on 'Hide like and view counts' to hide them on your posts and others' posts.

guides.title: Control Message Requests
guides.description: Manage who can send you direct messages on Instagram.

steps.title: Open Message Settings
steps.instruction: Go to Settings > Messages and story replies.

steps.title: Configure Message Controls
steps.instruction: Choose who can message you: Everyone, People you follow, or No one.

steps.title: Review Message Requests
steps.instruction: Check your message requests folder regularly and delete unwanted messages.

guides.title: Review Login Activity
guides.description: Check where your account is logged in and log out suspicious sessions.

steps.title: Open Security Settings
steps.instruction: Navigate to Settings > Account Center > Password and security.

steps.title: View Login Activity
steps.instruction: Tap on 'Where you're logged in' to see all active sessions.

steps.title: Log Out Suspicious Sessions
steps.instruction: Review the list and log out of any unrecognized devices or locations.

guides.title: Enable Two-Factor Authentication
guides.description: Add an extra layer of security to your Instagram account.

steps.title: Access Security Settings
steps.instruction: Go to Settings > Account Center > Password and security.

steps.title: Select Two-Factor Authentication
steps.instruction: Tap on 'Two-factor authentication' and select your account.

steps.title: Choose Authentication Method
steps.instruction: Select either 'Authentication app' (recommended) or 'Text message (SMS)'.

steps.title: Complete Setup
steps.instruction: Follow the prompts to complete the two-factor authentication setup.

guides.title: Manage Data Sharing with Partners
guides.description: Control how Instagram shares your data with advertisers and partners.

steps.title: Open Ad Settings
steps.instruction: Navigate to Settings > Ads.

steps.title: Review Ad Topics
steps.instruction: See and manage ad topics you see less of.

steps.title: Manage Data Sharing
steps.instruction: Go to 'Data about your activity from partners' and turn off to limit data sharing.
